Nat.bits_inj : forall a b : nat, Nat.eqf (Nat.testbit a) (Nat.testbit b) -> a = b
Nat.pow_nonzero : forall a b : nat, a <> 0 -> a ^ b <> 0

Bool.negb_true_iff : forall b : bool, negb b = true < -> b = false
